SELECT client_bacct, client_code, client_name, balancem, state FROM client

SELECT c.client_name ,pl.rec_date ,p.acct_name ,p.summary ,pl.increase_price ,pl.decrease_price ,(pl.increase_price-pl.decrease_price) as balance FROM client c JOIN payables_log pl ON c.client_code = pl.client_code JOIN purchase p ON p.purchase_chit_no = pl.purchase_chit_no WHERE c.client_code = #{clientCode}

SELECT c.client_name ,rl.rec_date ,s.acct_name ,s.summary ,rl.increase_price ,rl.decrease_price ,(rl.increase_price-rl.decrease_price) as balance FROM client c JOIN receivables_log rl ON c.client_code = rl.client_code JOIN sales s ON s.sales_chit_no = rl.sales_chit_no WHERE rl.client_code = #{clinetCode}
SELECT m.sales_chit_no ,m.chit_date ,m.supply_price ,m.client_code ,m.summary ,FIND_CODE(i.invoice_status) invoice_status FROM sales m JOIN invoice i ON m.invoice_no = i.invoice_no

SELECT '매출전표' as type ,m.sales_chit_no ,m.chit_date ,m.supply_price ,(SELECT client_name FROM client c WHERE m.client_code = c.client_code) client_name ,m.client_code ,m.summary ,FIND_CODE(i.invoice_status) invoice_status FROM sales m JOIN invoice i ON m.invoice_no = i.invoice_no
UNION
SELECT '매입전표', purchase_chit_no ,chit_date ,supply_price ,(SELECT client_name FROM client c WHERE p.client_code = c.client_code) client_name ,client_code ,summary ,FIND_CODE(invoice_status) invoice_status FROM purchase p
ORDER BY chit_date desc

SELECT invoice_no ,invoice_date ,find_code(invoice_status) as invoice_status ,nts_invoice_date ,saleslip_no ,(select client_name from client c where c.client_code = ( SELECT client_code FROM sales s WHERE s.sales_chit_no = i.saleslip_no)) as client_name ,(SELECT supply_price FROM sales s WHERE s.sales_chit_no = i.saleslip_no) as supply_price ,(SELECT vat FROM sales s WHERE s.sales_chit_no = i.saleslip_no) as vat ,(SELECT total_price FROM sales s WHERE s.sales_chit_no = i.saleslip_no) as total_price FROM invoice i ORDER BY invoice_date desc
SELECT acct_code ,acct_name ,debit_side FROM acnt_acct WHERE debit_side = #{debitSide}

SELECT sales_chit_no ,chit_date ,(select client_name from client c where c.client_code = s.client_code)as client_code ,client_code as client_no ,acct_name ,supply_price ,vat ,total_price ,summary ,saleslip_no ,invoice_no ,writer ,rec_balance ,rec_status FROM sales s WHERE sales_chit_no = #{salesChitNo}

SELECT purchase_chit_no ,chit_date ,(select client_name from client c where c.client_code = p.client_code)as client_code ,acct_name ,supply_price ,vat ,total_price ,writer ,decrease_balance ,summary ,purcslip_no FROM purchase p WHERE purchase_chit_no = #{purchaseChitNo}
